text: Kasero, ki Alloh kustanasro harom kardaast, nakused, magar ʙar haq (ja'ne, ʙa qasos jo sangsor kardani zinokor, jo kustani murtad). Va har kas, ki ʙa sitam kusta savad, ʙaroi sohiʙi xuni u qudrate dodaem, (xohad qasos girad, xohad xunʙaho girad, xohad ʙaxsad) vale dar qasos az had naguzarad, ʙegumon xuni kustasuda ʙar kusandaas jori doda sudaast
